title: A Voyage From Calcutta To The Mergui Archipelago, Lying On The East Side Of The Bay Of Bengal
creator: Forrest, Thomas
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Forrest, Thomas: A Voyage From Calcutta To The Mergui Archipelago, Lying On The East Side Of The Bay Of Bengal  Describing a Chain of Islands, never before surveyed ... Also, An Account of the Islands Jan Sylan, Pulo Pinang, and the Port of Queda ... To Wich Are Added, An Account of the Island Celebes ...: Also, An Idea of making a Map of the World on a large Scale ... The whole illustrated with various Maps, and Views of Land ... Engraved by Mr. Caldwall. London  London  Edinburgh  Berlin
